/* getRecentBoardArticleListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_BOARD.DJ_BOARD_ARTICLE BA JOIN CAM_BOARD.DJ_BOARD B ON BA.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN CAM_BOARD.DJ_BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON BA.BOARD_CATEGORY_ID = BC.BOARD_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.V_EMP_INFO EI ON BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_MNG_SEQ = EI.EMP_SEQ WHERE BA.ACTIVE = 'Y'
AND BA.BOARD_CATEGORY_ID = #{searchCategory}
AND BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%')
AND BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%')
AND ( BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') OR BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') )
AND BA.REG_DATE > date_add(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY)
ORDER BY BA.REG_DATE DESC, BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_GROUP DESC, BA.BOARD_ARTICLE_ID ASC
